content.rendered:
A Handpicked Selection of Gillian’s Favourite Dining Spots Across the City.

Discover the best dining experiences Glasgow has to offer with Gillian, our Business Development Executive. From seafood havens to cosy Scottish bistros, this guide highlights Gillian’s top restaurants in Glasgow. Whether you’re a local foodie or visiting the city, let Little’s Chauffeur Drive take you to these culinary gems in style. Explore Glasgow’s finest dining spots with our personal recommendations, and find out why they are Gillian’s favourites!

Crabshakk Botanics

“It’s all about the vibe! A constant hit with my friend and I, it is the sister restaurant to the Wee Shakk in Finnieston. Crabshakk Botanics has a lively, New York-inspired feel and it is a seafood lover’s paradise. Featuring everything from classic fish and chips to crab claws and scallops…but please don’t forget the cocktail list – it’s a spicy margarita for me!”

Number 16

“Again in the West End of Glasgow, Number 16 is a small and cosy restaurant that offers a seasonal, Scottish-inspired menu. I particularly enjoy going for a festive lunch where your first course is always a warming glass of mulled wine!”

Ka Pao

“For something a little more vibrant, Ka Pao never disappoints. Southeast Asian-inspired cuisine with a great buzzy atmosphere, offering a menu filled with flavourful dishes – the corn ribs and fried chicken are a must.”

Shucks

“Another west-end eatery – they had me at Champagne Trolley! Shucks is a relaxed seafood restaurant with a happy hour of ‘buck-a-shuck’ (£1 an oyster) and staff going around with champagne on wheels…it’s a firm favourite with my family.”

Lobo

“On the odd occasion that I venture south of the river, Lobo on Pollokshaws Road is a Mediterranean delight. The small, sharing plates are delicious and all in a cool, relaxed, and friendly atmosphere. A must-visit in the area, followed by one for the road at Lunar Wine & Cocktail Bar.”

Join us on a journey through the top restaurants in Glasgow. With our chauffeur drive services, you can enjoy these culinary delights with ease and comfort. Whether you’re here for a short visit or a local looking to explore new tastes, let us enhance your dining experiences in this vibrant city. Get a quick quote today.

Back to News

excerpt.rendered: A Handpicked Selection of Gillian’s Favourite Dining Spots Across the City.
